title: Beauty of Joseon Glow Deep Serum Rice + Alpha-Arbutin
description:
About this item
Radiant Revelation: Unveil the beauty secrets of Joseon with the Glow Deep Serum, a meticulously crafted blend of rice and alpha-arbutin for unparalleled radiance. Address dark spots, discoloration, and acne scars with a powerful formula enriched with rice and alpha arbutin.
Korean Skincare Essential: Elevate your skincare routine with the Beauty of Joseon Glow Deep Serum, a commitment to timeless k-beauty secrets that unlocks the path to glowing, flawless skin.
Key Ingredients: Rice Water 68%: Moisturizing, hydration and glowing. Alpha-Albutin 2%: Radiance, dark spots, skin protection and pigmentation. Niacinamide: Skin tone, skin barrier and acne care.
Deep Hydration, Rice Bran: Rice bran water moisturizes, enhances suppleness. Experience intense hydration alongside pigmentation correction for ultimate skin health.
Tackle Skin Concerns: Suited for all skin types, even sensitive. Tackle uneven tone, dark spots, and dryness. Reveal luminosity and confidence in your skin's journey.

This sheet mask is helpful for those who cannot apply makeup due to dry skin, or for those who want to moisturize their skin due to easily irritable skin problems.
[Healthier skin] It helps maintain the natural health of the skin because it contains natural herbal ingredients such as mugwort extract, ballware extract, ginseng extract, and green tea extract.
[Centella Asiatica Extract 15%] Centella asiatica is an ingredient known to help heal wounds since the ancient times, and it helps soothe and regenerate sensitive and damaged skin.
[hyaluronic acids] There are three hyaluronic acids that can help keep your skin moist and healthy (hyaluronic acid, hydrolyzed hyaluronic acid, sodium hyaluronic acid).

features: ["[Calming Serum] This product is designed to improve easily irritated and sensitive skin. 50% of green tea water+ 30% mugwort, which is known for its soothing effect, and 5% of panthenol, which creates synergy, are blended together. Panthenol forms a moisture film on the skin surface to protect it from external stimuli.", "[Glow Deep Serum] This product is made for skin with pigmentation. It helps equalize the skin tone by blending 68.6% of rice bran water, which is rich in amino acids and minerals and help keep dry skin moist, and 2% of arbutin, which prevent excessive production of melanin and help prevent pigmentation.", "[Glow Serum] This product is designed to improve skin with skin problems. 59.94% of propolis extract, which helps relieve skin troubles, 2% of niacinamide, reduces skin troubles by balancing oil and moisture, and 0.5% of betaine salicylate helps remove sebum in pores are blended together.", "[Revive Serum] This product is made for skin that has pigmentation and low elasticity. title: Beauty of Joseon Jelloskin Massage Cream Moisturizing Face and Body Lotion for Relaxing Massage Bruise Sore Muscle Relaxation 200ml, 6.76 fl.oz (Cream Only)
description:
About this item
Luxurious Massage Cream: Indulge in a pampering skincare experience with our Beauty of Joseon Jelloskin Massage Cream, designed to moisturize and relax your skin. Pamper yourself with a spa-worthy massage experience that leaves your skin feeling soft, supple, and relaxed.
Moisturizing Formula: Infused with hydrating ingredients, this cream deeply nourishes your skin while leaving it feeling soft and supple. Combines deep moisture with a glide-on texture, perfect for a relaxing facial or full-body massage.
Relaxation and Soothing: Ease away tension and fatigue as you massage this cream into your skin, enjoying its soothing properties that help calm both body and mind. Eases tension and discomfort, making it ideal for tired muscles and achy joints.
Slow Absorbing for Massages: With its slow-absorbing formula, this cream is perfect for extended massage sessions, allowing you to fully enjoy the benefits of relaxation and muscle relief.
Great Gift: Perfect for grand parents, moms, dads, girlfriends and boyfriends as a birthday gift and event for special occasions. Present your loved ones with this Jelloskin Massage Cream
